transcription.text: Hello po, good morning po, Ma'am Daisy. Hello po.

transcription.text: Apo, Ma'am Daisy. By the way po, si Ray and I yung tumam-tum credit max calling in the help of Maya Bank over the recorded line. Before you proceed po, for your account security, please verify, last 4 digit po ng mobile number nyo na nakaregister kay Maya Bank is 2797 po.

transcription.text: Okay, thank you for confirming, Ma'am. As per checking dito sa account kay Maya Personal Loan, nag-15 days past yung ka-yesterday amounting 8,880.50 po. Aska lang po ano po naging reason but until now, pwede pa rin tayo nakapag-proceed ng payment po.
